Title: Locally made drugs now of better quality than before, says NAFDAC DG
Summary: The Director General of the National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control, Prof. Mojisola Adeyeye, declared that locally made drugs in Nigeria are now of better quality than they used to be . She made this known over the weekend .

Title: Nigerian Army detains soldier over alleged assault on female vendor
Summary: The Nigerian Army has announced the detention of Private Christopher Emmanuel, who is accused of assaulting a female vendor, Doshima, in Kula, Gwer West Local Government Area of Benue State . The incident occurred on May 6 and was reported to the army .

Title: Group urges FG to suspend monthly allocations to Benue, Zamfara
Summary: Concerned Citizens Network for Democracy (CCND) has issued a 72-hour ultimatum to the governments of Benue and Zamfara States, demanding the immediate recall of all suspended lawmakers or face legal action . Group urges FG to suspend monthly allocations to both states .

Title: Calls grow for end to emergency rule in Rivers State
Summary: A coalition of civic groups under the banner of Citizens’ Action for Democratic Restoration (CADR) has called on President Bola Tinubu to immediately end emergency rule in Rivers State . They warn that federal intervention has derailed constitutional governance and constitutional governance .

Title: Kogi gov reads riot act to contractors over substandard road projects
Summary: Governor Ahmed Usman Ododo of Kogi State has read the riot act to contractors handling various road projects to guard against compromising standards . Governor Ododo spoke at the weekend on conclusion of a road project review .

Title: FG’s PPP shoe, garment factories can cater for paramilitary agencies – ICRC
Summary: Infrastructure Concession Regulatory Commission (ICRC) says the Federal Government’s Public Private Partnership (PPP) initiative in the shoe and garment factory can significantly meet the uniform needs of paramilitary agencies . ICRC said the PPP is under the Nigeria Correctional Facility .

Title: NDLEA nabs Iran-bound woman with cocaine hidden in private part
Summary: NDLEA said it’s operatives foiled a desperate attempt by a woman, Ihensekhien Miracle Obehi to export large consignments of cocaine concealed in her private part, to Iran .

Title: Deport foreign criminals, toughen visa rules – Kemi Badenoch tells UK Prime Minister
Summary: Kemi Badenoch calls on Keir Starmer's Labour government to adopt the Conservatives' proposed deportation bill as a measure to reduce immigration . The leader of the UK Conservative Party has called on the Prime Minister to toughen visa rules .

Title: UK to deport more foreign criminals, raise visa criteria to reduce migration
Summary: UK government to give itself stronger powers to deport foreign criminals and lift the threshold for skilled worker visas in a bid to bring down immigration levels . UK to deport more foreign criminals, raise visa criteria to reduce migration .

Title: Air Peace evacuates 78 trafficked Nigerian women from Côte d’Ivoire
Summary: Nigeria’s flag carrier, Air Peace, has evacuated 78 Nigerian women free of charge from the Félix Houphouët-Boigny International Airport, Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire .

Title: 2027: I’m not returning to villa, I’ll campaign with Remi Tinubu — Patience Jonathan
Summary: Dame Patience Jonathan has ruled out any return to Aso Rock Villa, declaring instead that she will campaign alongside the First Lady, Senator Oluremi Tinubu, ahead of the 2027 general elections . The ex-First Lady threw her weight behind the principle of rotational leadership, describing the “turn-by-turn

Title: NSCDC seals illegal refinery, seizes petroleum products in Anambra
Summary: The Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps uncovered an illegal artisanal refinery and illegal petrol station at Y-Junction, Nkwelle Ezunaka in Oyi Local Government Area of Anambra State . The team conducted the raid on Saturday following a credible intelligence of suspected illegal dealings in petroleum products within the area .

Title: Tinubu celebrates business tycoon Eludoyin at 77
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has congratulated Chief Dipo Eludoyin, his confidant and businessman, on his 77th birthday . The president highlighted the contributions of his age-long associate to Nigeria, Ile-Ife, and humanity, Mr Bayo Onanuga, his spokesman, said in a statement on Sunday

Title: NDLEA arrests woman hiding cocaine in private part at Port Harcourt airport
Summary: Ihensekhien Obehi was caught with three wraps of cocaine in her private part, two parcels hidden in a false bottom of her handbag, and 67 pellets she had swallowed . She claimed she was meant to swallow 70 pellets of cocaine but, after ingesting 67, could no longer continue and decided to insert the remaining

Title: Bauchi Rep donates tractor, farm aid to farmers
Summary: The member representing Darazo-Ganjuwa in the Federal House of Representatives, Mansur Soro, has donated a Massey Ferguson 375 tractor to support farmers ahead of the rainy season . Soro also launched the first phase of the MMS Young Millionaires in Agriculture programme, empowering 125 selected youths .
